desc: Why do biologists do what they do? How is biology actually done? Students investigate the reasons biological science is done the way it is today. Students have the opportunity to design and perform their own experiments while learning the process of scientific investigation. Designed primarily for non-majors. Offered during Interim.
name: Thinking & Doing Bio
notes: This course will meet only from June 2 - June 27.
title: Thinking and Doing Biology
